original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya sāvatthim piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesane aggi pajjalito hoti āhuti paggahitā.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesane aggi pajjalitaḥ hoti āhuti paggahitā

original: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ sapadānaṁ piṇḍāya caramāno yena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavā sāvatthiyam sa padānam piṇḍāya caramānaḥ yena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanam tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
analyzed: addasā khalu aggikabhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam dūratas u vaḥ āgacchanta

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā aggikabhāradvājaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavān aggikabhāradvājam brāhmaṇam etat avoca

original: “jānāsi pana tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vasalaṁ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme”ti?
analyzed: jānāsi pana tva brāhmaṇa vasalam vā vasala karaṇe vā dhamma iti

original: “Na khvāhaṁ, bho gotama, jānāmi vasalaṁ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme;
analyzed: na khvā aha bho gotama jānāmi vasalam vā vasala karaṇe vā dhamme

original: sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetu, yathāhaṁ jāneyyaṁ vasalaṁ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhavam gotamaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā aham jāneyyam vasalam vā vasala karaṇe vā dhamma iti

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi brāhmaṇa suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhoti kho aggikabhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi
na hi te iṇam atthi iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte aggikabhāradvājaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti
